alert.note: Alert for Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:03PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern West Feliciana, north central East Feliciana Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southeastern Wilkinson Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 402 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Norwood, or 12 miles north of Jackson, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Centreville, Woodville, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield and Spillman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
